message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper deals with the localization of endoscopic capsule robots, which is a robotics and computer vision problem. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.RO (Robotics). The paper proposes a novel architecture consisting of recurrent networks (RNN) embedded into a convolutional neural network (CNN), which is a deep learning approach for computer vision. Hence, it is likely to belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves supervised training of the proposed architecture, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the proposed method involves the use of neural networks, which is a subfield of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
